name: Active Crowds
description:
Active Crowds is a physics-based strategy game where you can interact with large groups of people. Buy traps, bombs, black holes and place them in optimal positions to defend against the flow of human crowds!Tower defence
Your mission is clear: do everything possible to stop the crowd! Plan your tactics wisely. Given your budget for a level, you need to carefully think what objects to buy and carefully plan the exact spots where you place each object.Physics based animations!
A unique experience with rigidbody structured characters!Mission: Prevent an Incident
Something bad is going to happen. Find out how it occurs and what can be done to prevent it.Endless Mode
How long can you last against unyielding waves of crowds?Sandbox Mode
In this mode, you have unlimited resources. The only limit is your imagination!
